channel.title: glazeruns TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

item.title: I arrived at Leadville (10,200' above sea level) and immediately needed a nap. Long day of travel kicked my butt. The whole time, I was dreaming I was suffocating. I woke up out of breath with a headache. @cwarreninspire convinced me to do a little shake
item.description: I arrived at Leadville (10,200' above sea level) and immediately needed a nap. Long day of travel kicked my butt. The whole time, I was dreaming I was suffocating. I woke up out of breath with a headache. @cwarreninspire convinced me to do a little shake

item.title: Leadville 100 miler starts at 4am MST. There will be tracking. Getting ready to take on the legendary Leadville 100 this weekend! This race is one of the toughest out there—100 miles at high altitude (above 10,000 feet) through the stunning Colorado Rocki
item.description: Leadville 100 miler starts at 4am MST. There will be tracking. Getting ready to take on the legendary Leadville 100 this weekend! This race is one of the toughest out there—100 miles at high altitude (above 10,000 feet) through the stunning Colorado Rocki

item.title: Leadville 100 miler Lucky number 406 Time to crush See you in the morning Smile, or you're doing it wrong . #ultrarunner #ultramarathon #Leadville100 #runtok
item.description: Leadville 100 miler Lucky number 406 Time to crush See you in the morning Smile, or you're doing it wrong . #ultrarunner #ultramarathon #Leadville100 #runtok

item.title: They look great after the shower #runtok #ultramarathon #Leadville100
item.description: They look great after the shower #runtok #ultramarathon #Leadville100

item.title: I could barely eat or drink the last 25 miles, my nose was bleeding, and I had minor pulmonary edema. Running above 10,000 feet for 100 miles is no joke. #Leadville100 #runtok #ultramarathon
item.description: I could barely eat or drink the last 25 miles, my nose was bleeding, and I had minor pulmonary edema. Running above 10,000 feet for 100 miles is no joke. #Leadville100 #runtok #ultramarathon

item.title: Another buckle to add to the collection
item.description: Another buckle to add to the collection

item.title: No more slacking. Time to start training. Or is it time to taper. Maybe I'm confused. Will I see you in Chamonix? Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultramarathon #utmb
item.description: No more slacking. Time to start training. Or is it time to taper. Maybe I'm confused. Will I see you in Chamonix? Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultramarathon #utmb

item.title: step 1 - put lube in plastic bag step 2 - turn bag inside out step 3 - use bag like a glove step 4 - reapply to the parts on your body that might chafe. step 5 - throw away bag your hand stays clean and you don't chafe. it weighs almost nothing. #ultramar
item.description: step 1 - put lube in plastic bag step 2 - turn bag inside out step 3 - use bag like a glove step 4 - reapply to the parts on your body that might chafe. step 5 - throw away bag your hand stays clean and you don't chafe. it weighs almost nothing. #ultramar

item.title: I always start a race with a fresh pair of shoes—usually with just about 5 miles on them to ensure everything fits right, especially the laces. After the race, they get downgraded to training shoes. These are the Hoka Challengers 7s, which I stick with be
item.description: I always start a race with a fresh pair of shoes—usually with just about 5 miles on them to ensure everything fits right, especially the laces. After the race, they get downgraded to training shoes. These are the Hoka Challengers 7s, which I stick with be

item.title: UTMB starts Friday. Paul Johnson and I will be running 170km (106 miles) around Mont Blanc for an epic adventure in France, Italy, and Switzerland. This is the hardest ultramarathon I have done. The mountain weather mixed with the insane amount of vertica
item.description: UTMB starts Friday. Paul Johnson and I will be running 170km (106 miles) around Mont Blanc for an epic adventure in France, Italy, and Switzerland. This is the hardest ultramarathon I have done. The mountain weather mixed with the insane amount of vertica

item.title: UTMB has mandatory gear requirements. They check to make sure you are carrying this throughout the race. Race starts Friday. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #utmb #ultramarathon #runtok
item.description: UTMB has mandatory gear requirements. They check to make sure you are carrying this throughout the race. Race starts Friday. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #utmb #ultramarathon #runtok

item.title: Four days until UTMB. I'll be looking for this beautiful cow again. My favorite video from UTMB even though it has nothing to do with running. Hopefully, I won't be so out of my mind this time around. Should I pet her? Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #ut
item.description: Four days until UTMB. I'll be looking for this beautiful cow again. My favorite video from UTMB even though it has nothing to do with running. Hopefully, I won't be so out of my mind this time around. Should I pet her? Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #ut

item.title: Just me? Nothing like thinking you were dying of lead poisoning all week only to discover the patient portal linked the wrong description to the test you took. I know a heck of a lot about lead poisoning now. Definitely not something that you want to get.
item.description: Just me? Nothing like thinking you were dying of lead poisoning all week only to discover the patient portal linked the wrong description to the test you took. I know a heck of a lot about lead poisoning now. Definitely not something that you want to get.

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
